description: This client type is interested in purchasing insurance policies to protect themselves and their assets. They are likely to be aware of the importance of insurance but may be overwhelmed by the variety of options available. They are attracted to YONO's integrated platform and the convenience of linking insurance policies to their account. They will appreciate clear and concise explanations of different insurance products, their coverage, and their benefits. They may have specific questions about policy premiums, claim settlement processes, and the credibility of the insurance providers. They need reassurance that they are making informed decisions and choosing the right insurance policies for their needs. They are likely to use YONO to manage their insurance policies, pay premiums, and track claim status.
